article_node.title: Google just made it a whole lot easier to access Password Manager
article_node.summary: The article surveys the top Android phones of 2024, ranking devices across categories such as overall flagship, camera, battery, gaming, foldable, and budget. It names the Google Pixel 9 Pro XL as the best overall, Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra as the best for power users, OnePlus 13 for battery life, ASUS ROG Phone 9 Pro for gaming, and highlights others like the Motorola Razr Ultra, Pixel 9 Pro, OnePlus 13, and Pixel 9 Pro Fold. The piece also offers practical buying advice—software updates, camera flexibility, display size, RAM/storage, durability, charging speed, and AI features—while explaining the author’s credibility and testing methodology. The focus is on helping readers choose a phone that fits their priorities and usage needs.
